Method.name: Load
Method.Description: Load posts of topic with ExtId <var>topic</var> <var>data</var> - key-value array <var>data("topic")</var> - topicId by sql.ru <var>data("pages")</var> = "a" - all - if we can load all pages for one time , or number of pages of posts of topic

Method.name: Scan
Method.Description: scan across all forum posts pages
Method.Implementation:
#define g(%prop) $g(data(%prop))
s topic = $$$g("topic") ;topicid from sql.ru s pages = $$$g("pages") ;pages - pages count (number) or "a" - all, convention from sql.ru
s i = 1 s:pages="a" i = "a" ;current page with posts s page = ..GetPage( topic, i, .sc ) Q:'sc sc
#; first post in topic contain date of topic creation s page.firstPost = 1
s sc = page.Parse() Q:'sc sc
#; Load and parse pages from 1 to pages #;"a" - all posts of topic - convention from sql.ru if pages = "a" Q sc
#; if pages is numeric for { s i = i + 1 Q:i>pages
s sc = page.Get( , i ) Q:'sc ;load page #i in parser s sc = page.Parse() Q:'sc }
Q sc

Method.name: OnPost
Method.Description: Event handler <var>data</var> - key-value array If handler return 0, parsing will be interrupted
Method.Implementation:
Q:'##class(Topic).ExtIdExists( ..Topic, .topicId ) 0 s data("Topic") = topicId ;set parent
k author s author("Name") = data("Author") s author("ExtId") = $g(data("Author","ExtId")) s sc = ##class(Forum.Author).GetOrSet(.author) Q:'sc sc s data("AuthorId") = author
s sc = ##class(Post).Insert( .data ) Q:'sc sc w "." if ..firstPost { ;first post's date is the date of topic's creation
s sc = ##class(Topic).SetPosted(topicId, data("Posted") ) Q:'sc $$$ERROR($$$GeneralError," update topic.posted error") s ..firstPost = 0
}
Q sc
